SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sunstone Farms relative to Golden Harvest Cooperative?
SRP.A: Sunstone Farms is {above} Golden Harvest Cooperative in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total water usage?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Riverbend Plantation}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total water usage?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Whispering Willows Estate}.

VE.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative's water usage is {2506257.01} cubic meters, Whispering Willows Estate's water usage is {20000} cubic meters, Sunstone Farms's water usage is {158649.69} cubic meters.

SC.Q: What is the average total Water Usage?
SC.A: The average total water usage is {10772530.75} cubic meters.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Water Usage go below 10116543.72 cubic meters? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Water Usage fall between 9980326.46 and 11030887.14 cubic meters? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Water Usage exceed 10894669.88 cubic meters? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1990, did the total Water Usage experience a larger or smaller change than between 1964 and 1972?
NC.A: The change in total water usage between 1986 and 1990 was {larger} than between 1964 and 1972.

NC.Q: Was the total Water Usage in 1975 higher or lower than in 1978?
NC.A: The total water usage in 1975 was {higher} than in 1978.

NC.Q: Between 1989 and 1990, was the average total Water Usage higher or lower than between 1965 and 1984?
NC.A: The average total water usage between 1989 and 1990 was {higher} than between 1965 and 1984.

NC.Q: Was the total Water Usage in 1973 higher or lower than in 1981?
NC.A: The total water usage in 1973 was {lower} than in 1981.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Riverbend Plantation} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Whispering Willows Estate, Sunstone Farms, Golden Harvest Cooperative, Starfall Organics, Riverbend Plantation}.
